contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1906 D Dodworth Contest
Dodworth Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
dodworth-contest
None
Dodworth, South Yorkshire, England, UK 1st prize £8, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £2.10s., 4th prize £1 divided between Grimesthorpe and Houghton Main. March contest 1st (£1) Houghton Main, 2nd (10s.) Rockingham. 6 bands competed.
March 7, 2012, 4:45 p.m. Sept. 14, 2018, 10:42 a.m.
1 Rotherham Main Colliery William Wilson
2 Parkgate Temperance John Ellis Dyson
3 Rawmarsh Prize Band William Wilson
4 Grimesthorpe George H. Mercer
4 Houghton Main Colliery William Heap
6 Rockingham Band Joseph Boothroyd
Withdrawn Old Silkstone Unknown
